description.p: You were born into a humble home with an absent father. You lived in the outskirts of the village together with your mother from which you learned your craft.

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: Cook's Utensils, Herbalism Kit
Equipment: A set of common clothes, a cook's utensils, a healer's kit, a herbalism kit and a belt pouch containing 15 gp.

setters.set: Nature, Medicine, Cook's Utensils, Herbalism Kit

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: There is someone I idolize and I constantly refer to that person's deeds.
I tell white lies when the truth could hurt another person.
When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what gets in my way.
I am naive when it comes to romance, believing in the stories of knights and princesses.
If I insult or hurt someone's feelings I do my utmost to repair the damage.
I enjoy listening to stories of heroes from ages past.
I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.
I often get lost in my own thoughts.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Aspiration. I'm determined to make something of myself. (Any)
Respect. All people, rich or poor, deserve respect. (Good)
Friendship. Material goods come and go. Bonds of friendship last forever. (Good)
Independence. I must prove that I can handle myself without the coddling of my family. (Chaotic)
People. I'm committed to the people I care about, not to ideals. (Neutral)
Tradition. The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten. (Lawful)

select.name: Bond
select.item: Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.
I suffer awful visions of a coming disaster and will do anything to prevent it.
I idolize a hero of the old tales and measure my deeds against that person's.
I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
Nothing is more important that the other members of my family.
I've been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I laugh uncontrollably when I am frightened.
I have a 'tell' that reveals when I'm lying.
I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden. My sharp tongue lands me in trouble.
I'd risk too much to uncover a lost bit of knowledge.
There's no room for caution in a life lived to the fullest.
I am easily distracted by the promise of information.

description.p: You have a knack of finding herbs in the wild. As long as the current environment can feasibly provide it, you may forage enough herbs and other ingredients required to craft either an antitoxin or a basic healing potion. You are also able to find enough food and water for yourself and up to 3 other people to survive whilst in a forest – though the food is often unpleasant or unpalatable.
